entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
